describe: 首页-软件管理-常用软件推荐

list.title: Website Firewall
list.name: btwaf
list.ps: Mitigating DDOS attacks, easily creating custom rules, protecting your website and reducing the risk of malicious attacks and data leakage, it is recommended to use Nginx 1.18 and above

list.title: Website Firewall
list.name: btwaf_httpd
list.ps: Mitigating DDOS attacks, easily creating custom rules, protecting your website and reducing the risk of malicious attacks and data leakage, it is recommended to use Nginx 1.18 and above

list.title: Website statistics
list.name: total
list.ps: Real-time accurate statistics of website traffic, ip, uv, pv, requests, spiders and other data

list.title: Website Tamper-proof for Enterprise
list.name: tamper_core
list.ps: Effectively intercept 99.9% of illegal modification of web pages, tampering of files, etc. Note: Cannot be used with other anti-tamper software

list.title: Anti-intrusion
list.name: bt_security
list.ps: Effective defense against intrusion into the system through processes such as websites, redis, mysql, etc.

describe: 首页-安全入口-推荐安全软件

name: waf_nginx
title: 网站加速
ps: 基于nginx页面缓存的网站加速插件,推荐WordPress用户安装，效果显著，仅支持Nginx

list.title: 防火墙
list.name: btwaf
list.ps: 有效拦截SQL 注入、XSS跨站、恶意代码、网站挂马等常见攻击，过滤恶意访问，降低数据泄露的风险，保障网站的可用性。

list.title: 防火墙
list.name: btwaf_httpd
list.ps: 有效拦截SQL 注入、XSS跨站、恶意代码、网站挂马等常见攻击，过滤恶意访问，降低数据泄露的风险，保障网站的可用性。

list.title: 统计
list.name: total
list.ps: 快速分析网站运行状况，实时精确统计网站流量、ip、uv、pv、请求、蜘蛛等数据，网站SEO优化利器

list.title: 统计
list.name: total
list.ps: 快速分析网站运行状况，实时精确统计网站流量、ip、uv、pv、请求、蜘蛛等数据，网站SEO优化利器

describe: 网站管理-推荐安全软件

list.title: 网站防篡改程序
list.name: tamper_proof
product_introduce: 阻止黑客非法修改网页
list.ps: 事件型防篡改程序,可有效保护网站重要文件不被木马篡改

list.title: 限制访问型证书
list.name: ssl_verify
list.ps: 提供双向认证证书，可用于限制指定人员访问

describe: 文件管理-推荐安全软件

list.title: 数据同步
list.name: rsync
list.ps: 基于rsync开发的数据同步工具，可用于异地备份、多台主机之间的文件实时或增量同步
